name: WP Mautic Form Integrator
author: Hireawiz

sections.description:
Introduction

Mautic is an open-source marketing automation software and WP Mautic Form Integrator plugin is a bridge between Mautic’s back-end interface and many of the most frequently used form builder plugins in WordPress.

WP Mautic Form Integrator will allow you to use the form builder plugin you are already using to collect email data and other information for Mautic’s marketing automation. Without writing a single line of code you can bring your email lists into one of the most comprehensive open-source marketing applications available.

With WP Mautic Form Integrator plugin you are able to map the form fields of your chosen form builder plugin with the fields defined within Mautic. To use, just install the WP Mautic Form Integrator plugin, set up the value you wish to collect, connect them with the pre-existing Mautic values, and you will be ready to integrate the forms in no time.

Key features

  • Easy setup and integration
  • Store data from your WordPress contact plugin in Mautic
  • Simple to use UI to map the form fields with the Mautic form fields.
  • Keep the data map even if you delete or deactivate the plugin

Compatibility

WP Mautic Form Integrator plugin currently works with the following plugins;

Open source plugins

  • Contact Form 7
  • Fast Secure Forms
  • Ninja Forms
  • Formidable Forms

Premium plugins

  • Gravity Forms

Developer documentation

To know more about the hooks and filters, please visit the plugin documentation here.

Support

All support related requests should be sent via support request form here.

Important: We are currently working on an upgraded version of our plugin to support the new Mautic edits for free in the coming weeks. If you need priority support please visit our WP agency site at www.hireawiz.com and submit a quote for an integration request.
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for WP Mautic Form Integrator
  3. Activate WP Mautic Form Integrator from your Plugins page.

Manual Installation

  1. Download WP Mautic Form Integrator Plugin.
  2. Upload the wp-mautic-form-integrator directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp)
  3. Activate WP Mautic Form Integrator from your Plugins page.

Manual Installation

  1. Download WP Mautic Form Integrator Plugin.
  2. Visit Plugins > Add New
  3. Click on upload plugin button.
  4. Click on browse button and select plugin zip file. After file select click on Install Now button.
  5. Click on Activate Plugin button.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with WP Mautic Form Integrator plugin? Use these support channels appropriately.

  1. Docs
  2. FAQ
  3. Support Forum

Installation Instructions

Automatic Installation

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for WP Mautic Form Integrator
  3. Activate WP Mautic Form Integrator from your Plugins page.

Manual Installation

  1. Download WP Mautic Form Integrator Plugin.
  2. Upload the wp-mautic-form-integrator directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp)
  3. Activate WP Mautic Form Integrator from your Plugins page.

Manual Installation

  1. Download WP Mautic Form Integrator Plugin.
  2. Visit Plugins > Add New
  3. Click on upload plugin button.
  4. Click on browse button and select plugin zip file. After file select click on Install Now button.
  5. Click on Activate Plugin button.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Fixed the issue with the Ninja Forms
  • Functionality tested upto WordPress 4.8

1.0.2

  • Fixed the issue with the session
  • Fixed the issue with the base_url field to remove the trailing slash

1.0.1

  • Deleted various composer packages which were unsed
  • Removed the use of putenv function as per WPEngine support request
  • Updated the readme.txt

1.0

  • Initial Version
